categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tarben Jenoquan was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. By 3643 BBY, Jenoquan was studying at the Place of Enlightenment Through Knowledge on Romossobar when the Jedi was infected with a plague by the Sith Lord Vivicar. However, Jenoquan was freed when Vivicar was defeated.

Tarben Jenoquan was first mentioned in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, in a message to Jedi Consular players after end of Act I if they chose to allow Terrak Morrhage to kill the Jedi Masters connected to him.
